subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Bill Robinson was a longtime outfielder who played on the Pittsburgh Pirates’ 1979 World Series champions and was the batting coach for World Series winners with the Mets and Florida Marlins.
snippet: Bill Robinson was a longtime outfielder who played on the Pittsburgh Pirates’ 1979 World Series champions and was the batting coach for World Series winners with the Mets and Florida Marlins.
